jobTitle: Sensing Hardware Algorithm & Systems Engineering Director
skills: Experience shipping high-volume consumer electronics products with sophisticated sensing systems.
Deep understanding of sensor technologies (e.g. optical, acoustic, inertial, environmental, etc.) and associated algorithms.
Experience with system-level architecture and optimization, including hardware/software partitioning.
Proficiency in data analysis and statistical modeling using tools such as Python, MATLAB, or JMP.
Strong background in signal processing, machine learning, and/or control systems.
Excellent communication, collaboration, and leadership skills to work effectively across diverse teams.
Proven track record of building and managing high-performing engineering teams.
Extensive experience in algorithm development, simulation, and validation.
Familiarity with sensor calibration, compensation, and error modeling techniques.
Experience with statistical process control and design of experiments for sensor characterization.
Knowledge of regulatory requirements and industry standards for sensor performance and safety.
responsibilities: Lead a team of talented engineers to develop innovative sensing solutions for future Apple products.
Define the system architecture and performance requirements for sensing hardware and algorithms.
Drive the development of advanced algorithms for sensor calibration, data fusion, and signal processing.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate sensing systems into product designs.
Oversee the validation and testing of sensing systems to ensure high accuracy and reliability.
Manage the team’s budget, resources, and project timelines.
Stay abreast of the latest advancements in sensing technologies and identify opportunities for innovation.
Foster a culture of technical excellence, collaboration, and continuous improvement within the team.
qualifications: Ph.D. or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, Physics, or a related field.
15+ years of experience in sensing system development and algorithm design.
